subject: p11213613
History: With fevers/chills and cough, has h/o emphysema, pneumonia.
Findings: Linear opacities of the lung bases bilaterally likely reflect atelectasis. Hyperlucency of the upper zones is reflective of emphysema. No focal consolidation, pleural effusion, or pneumothorax. Heart size and mediastinal contours are normal. Osseous structures are demineralized diffusely with a compression deformity in the mid thoracic spine which is unchanged from .
Impression: Emphysema and bibasilar atelectasis. No evidence of pneumonia.
